properties.name: Avalon @ Mission Bay Apt: Pacific Beach/I'll Be Back Someday
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll  3882 Jewell St, San Diego, CA 92109This might be my favorite address on the list. Water on all sides. Bicycle friendly. Great bars. Near Sea World. Sad to have left, but I don\'t know what I would have done if I had stayed.

properties.name: Broadway Village Apts: A Different Kind of Jail
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll2107 West Braodway Rd, Mesa, AZ 85202After doing my time in the Summit Co. Jail, this is where I landed. It could have been worse. Still not sure how I managed to turn things around.

properties.name: Desert Palm Apt: ASU's Student Holding Pen
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll1216 East Vista Del Cerro, Tempe, AZ 85281I think every Arizona State Student lives in this complex at least one semester. Bill & I moved here as a first step in showing his Dad we were financially responsible. He had promised to co-sign a home loan if we proved we could handle it. He backed out and we managed to finance a house without him.

properties.name: Downtown Denver...Again
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll1117 Pennsylvania St, Denver, CO 80206Made a bet w/Geoff Phelps that if the University of Arizona won the NCAA Basketball Tourney, I\'d leave the state. They won. I lost. Jeff Grange was moving to Denver anyway, so I packed my stuff and headed back to Colorado.

properties.name: Home Base
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll2040 Post House Ct, Bloomfield Hills, MI 48304My Parents Home. This was home base. Over the years I moved back several times to collect my thoughts, my things & my sanity. Moved out for the last time in Feb. of \'94.

properties.name: Jill's Mom's House
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll1614 West Earll Drive, Phoenix, AZ 85015Let\'s see, move back to Phoenix to be near my son. Don\'t want to be lonely, so I get back together with Jill. The plan looked good on paper. I didn\'t realize it was going to mean living in her mom\'s converted garage.

properties.name: Keystone Ski Resort: Trials By Ice
properties.description: Posted by NomadatollEmployee Housing, Keystone, COLived with Jeremy & 3 guys from South Carolina during all my court dates. This was the poorest I\'ve ever been. We only ate every other day.

properties.name: My First House
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll62 South Miller St, Mesa, AZ 85204Bought this house with Bill Fessler & Eric Johnson. Eric never came up with his share of the down payment, so he moved out. Steve moved into the third bedroom & my girlfriend/assistant manager @ work moved in with me. This was the first high point in my life after leaving home to go to college.

properties.name: My Second House
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll109 Road H, Silverthorne, CO 80498I bought this old hunting cabin, built an addition, got some dogs and thought I had created the life I\'d always wanted. Got bored. Got roommates. Got into drugs. Got a felony. I loved that house. I just didn\'t realize how much until it was gone. Yes, it\'s a cliche. That doesn\'t make it any less instructional.

properties.name: Ocotillo Hall: Nirvana to a Kid From Michigan
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll 401 East Apache Blvd, Tempe, AZ 85281A pool, sand vollyball court, not a single girl wearing sweat pants or a sweater, just t-shirts & shorts as far as the eyes could see. This was a much better choice compared to Central Michigan University. Can\'t imagine why I didn\'t graduate.

properties.name: Papago Vista Apts: Close to the Airport
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll5312 East Taylor St, Phoenix, AZ 85008Jill supported my first go @ proffesional gambling. Flying up & back to Vegas 4 days a week to play Baccarat. Did well enough to support the move to Denver.

properties.name: Penn Towers: Movin' On Up
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll550 East 12th Ave, Denver, CO 80203Convinced Jill to move to Denver. It\'ll be fun. Some high school friends just moved there too. Jay Shields & Jeff Borgnes lived just down the street. Oddly enough, we did have fun, renting a penthouse apartment and getting to know Denver. Then we broke up and I had even more fun.

properties.name: Raintree Apts: Gettin' It Together
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll5008 East Thomas Rd, Phoenix, AZ 85018Life\'s was getting back on track. Going back to school, good friends, employeed, plenty of girlfriends & about to be....WHAT?!?!....a Dad.

properties.name: Remind Me to Never Work in Radio Again
properties.description: Posted by NomadatollIndianola, MSJill and I had this rental house while we worked for WKZB. It might have been a good time, if the owner had ever paid us. Nothing like being poor in The South. If it wasn\'t for Jill\'s Exxon credit card, we might have starved.

properties.name: That Summer on Martha's Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by NomadatollHeather Lane, Oak Bluffs, MANeil convinced me that a summer on Nantucket would be the adventure of a lifetime. This is where we wound up. Sure enough it was a summer to remember.

properties.name: The Arboretum: A Quick Pause
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll7255 East Snyder Rd, Tucson, AZ 85750Living on the couch until Jeff, Geoff, Kevin & I can find a house to rent. Nothing better than beers in the hottub after a round of golf.

properties.name: The Baker St House
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll5301 East Baker St, Tucson, AZ 85711Roommates: Jeff, Geoff & Kevin. It seems like all we did was work @ Pizza Hut, play golf @ La Paloma CC & drink. Life was good.

properties.name: The House in the Back
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll1150 Fillmore St, Denver, CO 80206Great little one bed room house. I lived here longer that anywhere else, until I got married. Still miss The Ultimate @ Chef Zorba\'s up the street. The best hangover cure. Lots happened while I lived here. I helped Neil make Hijacking Hollywood & my Dad committed suicide.

properties.name: The House on Forth
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll3668 East 4th St, Tucson, AZ 85716Roommates: Jeff, Geoff & Dusky Landed here after bankruptcy ended the Vegas saga. Thank goodness these guys had a couch for me to crash on. Lowest point in my life. As usual, found a way to bounce back after a crisis.

properties.name: The Madison: Hollywood Baby!!!
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll1746 North Orange Drive, Hollywood, CA 90028Moved here from San Diego. Neil Mandt helped me get this place, since he lived there too. The day after I moved in Neil, Paul Tarintino & I went to Europe for 10 days. This place is right behind the Chinese Theater. You know, the place with the hand prints in the cement.

properties.name: The Place by the Beach
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll  Where Melanie & I lived when we got married.

properties.name: Tucson?  Sure Why Not
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll5441 North Swan Rd, Tucson, AZ 85718Maybe I\'ll move to Tucson and become a golf pro. Seemed like a good idea @ the time.

properties.name: Windsor @ Royal Palms: What Was I Thinking?
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll5711 West Tropicana Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89103Wasn\'t the first to move to Vegas in search of riches. Played Blackjack professionally, but didn\'t come with enough of a bank to support me, my girlfriend & the bad luck. Won\'t be the last to leave with my tail between my legs.

properties.name: Working in Radio is Cool, Isn't It?
properties.description: Posted by Nomadatoll507 Turner St, Brush, CO 80723Rental house while working @ KKGZ/KSIR. I\'ll tell you, there were not many rental places in Brush @ the time. The place for a burger & a beer was Jimmy\'s Pump.
